name: Grilled Beef (neua yang)
recipeIngredient: very large pinch of roasted chilli powder,
recipeInstructions: 1. Clean the beef and remove excess fat, as preferred. Marinate in the light soy sauce for an hour or so. Drain and pat dry.
2. To make the chilli sauce, combine the ingredients and check seasoning: the sauce should taste hot, sour, and salty.
3. Grill the beef over high heat for 5-10 minutes, until cooked to the preferred degree, then rest for the same amount of time in a warm place.
4. Slice and serve with the chilli sauce.
